versions.name: Avatar Toolkit 0.2.1 Alpha 2
versions.description:
Avatar Toolkit is currently in ALPHA. Expect bugs and issues during this early development phase.

Alpha 2 brings significant improvements with features designed to streamline your avatar creation workflow:

• Enhanced Armature Validation System
• Comprehensive Model Import Support
• Advanced Bone Standardization System
• Rigify to Unity Conversion Pipeline
• Complete Pose Mode Feature Set
• Multiple Export Options (FBX, Resonite)
• Performance Optimization Suite
• Custom Avatar Components Builder
• Viseme Creation and Management
• Atlas Texturing System
• Full Eye Tracking Support (Legacy and VRChat SDK3)
• Integrated Updater
• Advanced Debugging Options
versions.warning: Avatar Toolkit includes an armature validation system. Some tools require either a standard armature or validation to be disabled.

versions.name: Avatar Toolkit 0.1.3 Alpha 1
versions.description:
Avatar Toolkit is currently in ALPHA. Expect bugs and issues during this early development phase.

This first release introduces foundational features for efficient avatar creation:

• Core Armature Validation System
• Versatile Model Import Capabilities
• Intuitive Pose Mode Interface
• Flexible Export Options (FBX, Resonite)
• Essential Optimization Tools
• Custom Avatar Component Integration
• Viseme Creation Framework
• Eye Tracking Support (Legacy and VRChat SDK3)
• Built-in Update System
• Comprehensive Debug Environment
versions.warning: Avatar Toolkit includes an armature validation system. Some tools require either a standard armature or validation to be disabled.
